value.title: A Genius Strategy to a Dumb Challenge (Mouse ONLY) | Special vs Cham (1-game TvZ) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged pros to play with their mouse only (no keyboards!) to see what a pro StarCraft 2 game looks like with such a ridiculous rule. Here's Special (Terran) facing Cham (Zerg) trying it out! -- üê∑ Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom
